dbivanorm() dbivanorm()
density of bivariate normal distribution
drugdevelopR()
Utility based optimal phase II/III drug development planning
fmax()
density for minimum of two normally distributed, random variables Z=min(X,Y) with X~N(mu1,sigma1^2),Y~N(mu2,sigma2^2) f(z)=f1(z)+f2(z)
fmin()
density for minimum of two normally distributed, random variables Z=min(X,Y) with X~N(mu1,sigma1^2),Y~N(mu2,sigma2^2) f(z)=f1(z)+f2(z)
optimal_bias()
Optimal phase II/III drug development planning when discounting phase II results
optimal_bias_binary()
Optimal phase II/III drug development planning when discounting phase II results with binary endpoint
optimal_bias_normal()
Optimal phase II/III drug development planning with normally distributed endpoint
optimal_binary()
Optimal phase II/III drug development planning with binary endpoint

pw()
probabilty that P(x>y)=P(x-y>0) Z=X-Y is normally distributed with expectation mux-muy and variance sigmax+sigmay-2 rho sdx sdy
